short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly debug Rails applications with AI-powered insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Rails Assistant revolutionizes the Rails development process by integrating the powerful capabilities of OpenAI directly into your browser. This Chrome extension is designed specifically for Ruby on Rails developers, offering real-time assistance and code analysis.

Features:

- Instant Error Analysis: Automatically detects and analyzes errors in Rails applications.
- AI-Powered Solutions: Leverages OpenAI's advanced AI models to suggest solutions.
- Code Context Understanding: Provides context-aware recommendations by understanding the code structure.
- Easy-to-Use Interface: Seamlessly integrates into your development workflow with a user-friendly interface.
- Efficient Debugging: Reduces time spent on searching for solutions, enhancing productivity.
- Whether you're tackling complex bugs or looking for optimization suggestions, AI Rails Assistant is your go-to tool for smarter and faster Rails development.
